casebody.data:
INVITROGEN CORPORATION (formerly Life Technologies, Inc.), Plaintiff-Appellant, v. STRATAGENE HOLDING CORPORATION, Stratagene, Inc., and Biocrest Manufacturing, L.P., Defendants-Appellees. No. 01-1559. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. Feb. 11, 2002.

Before MICHEL, DYK and PROST, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED:

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
